uan.legend: Which form do you need to continue?

person-named.label: The person named on the Illegal Migration Act notice

has-legal-representative.label: An immigration advisor representing the claimant
has-legal-representative.hint: Such as a solicitor or legal representative. You must have already sent a letter of authority to the Home Office to confirm that you can represent the person named on the Illegal Migration Act notice.

helper.label: Someone helping the person named on the duty to remove notice
helper.hint: You cannot give immigration advice. You must answer all the questions as if you are the person named on the duty to remove letter.

in-the-uk.legend: Are you currently in the UK?

phone-number.legend: Do you have a phone number?

phone-number-details.label: Enter your phone number
phone-number-details.hint: For international numbers, please include country code

email-address.legend: Do you have an email address?
email-address.hint: We will use this to send you a copy of this form and to contact you about your claim.

legal-representative-phone-number.label: Phone number
legal-representative-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code.

helper-relationship.label: What is your relationship to the person on the Illegal Migration Act notice?

helper-organisation.label: Organisation name (optional)
helper-organisation.hint: For example, name of charity or support group.

has-address.legend: Are you currently in immigration detention?

has-permission-access.legend: Do you give us permission to access your Immigration Removal Centre medical records?

your-address.label: Enter your address
your-address.hint: This must be where you live.

does-exception-apply.legend: Does an exception to the duty to remove apply to you?

how-removal-condition-1-applies.legend: Why does your Illegal Migration Act notice say removal condition 1 applies to you?

entered-without-permission.label: You needed permission to enter the UK and you entered without permission

by-deception.label: You entered the UK with permission which you got by deception
by-deception.hint: For example, if you or someone else lied on your application.

deportation-order-applies.label: You entered the UK when a deportation order applied to you

travel-ban.label: When you arrived in or entered the UK, a travel ban applied to you
travel-ban.hint: This includes a travel ban imposed by the United Nations Security Council, or UK under the Sanctions and Anti-Money Laundering Act 2018.

arrived-without-visa.label: You needed a valid entry clearance (visa), and you arrived without it

arrived-without-eta.label: You needed a valid electronic travel authorisation (ETA), and you arrived without it

entered-without-permission.legend: Did you need permission to enter the UK but entered without it?

entered-without-permission-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

entered-with-travel-ban.legend: Did you arrive in or enter the UK, when a travel ban applied to you?

entered-with-travel-ban-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

entered-by-deception.legend: Did you enter the UK with permission you got by deception?

entered-by-deception-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

arrived-without-clearance.legend: Did you need a valid entry clearance (visa) but arrived without one?

arrived-without-clearance-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

without-eta.legend: Did you need a valid electronic travel authorisation (ETA) but arrived without one?

without-eta-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

deportation-order-applied.legend: Did you enter the UK when a deportation order applied to you?

deportation-order-applied-detail.label: Explain why this is not correct

arrived-date.legend: When did you arrive in or enter the UK?

arrival-after-date.legend: Did you arrive in the UK on or after 20 July 2023?

arrival-details.label: Enter details about when you arrived

is-life-threatened.legend: Did you come directly to the UK from a country where your life or liberty was threatened?

life-threatened-detail.label: Enter details of how you came to the UK

permission-to-enter-or-stay.legend: Do you have permission to enter or stay in the UK?

human-rights-claim.summary-heading: Making a human rights claim because of family in the UK

family-member-relation.label: What is their relationship to you?

family-member-nationality.label: What is their country of nationality?

uk-immigration-status.label: What is their UK immigration status?

reference-number-option.legend: What reference number do they have?

human-rights-claim-details.legend: Enter details of the human rights claim
human-rights-claim-details.label: Enter details of the human rights claim

temporary-permission-reasons.legend: What are your reasons for applying for temporary permission to stay in the UK?

temporary-permission.legend: Are there any reasons you should be granted temporary permission to stay in the UK?

are-you-submitting-this-form-late.legend: Are you submitting this form late?

are-you-submitting-this-form-late-extens.legend: Have you asked for an extension?

late-extension-options-yes-detail.legend: When did you ask for extension?

late-submission.label: Why are you submitting this form late?

person-declaration.label: I understand and agree with this declaration.

helper-declaration.label: I understand and agree with this declaration.

immigration-adviser-declaration.label: I understand and agree with this declaration.
